node.text:
**Last Day: New Release Sale!**

Grab your copies of our three new books at 25% off! The sale ends tonight (Monday, September 20) at 11:59 PM ET. Click the link in our bio to find these and more uplifting, high-quality books for all ages in The Good and the Beautiful Library!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on September 16, 2021. May be an image of book and text.

node.text:
**Discover the US Constitution!**

Interactive lessons, an adventure-filled full-length book, and so much more—the US Constitution and Government Course is one-of-a-kind! The 32-lesson Course Book is available as a FREE PDF for a limited time only. Learn more about this groundbreaking release at the link in our bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on September 15, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'CELE CELEBRATE CONSTITUTION DAY US CONSTITUTION PDF'.

node.text:
**Celebrate Constitution Day!**

Learn all about Constitution Day (September 17) through our new post on The Good and the Beautiful Blog. Then download a free US Constitution PDF to read the words of this meaningful document aloud with your family! Click the link in our bio to read more!

node.text:
**New Books: 25% Off!**

Solve a summer mystery, travel to Alaska, then hide away in a tree house! Our three new release books are 25% off through Monday, September 20. Find them only in The Good and the Beautiful Library! Link in bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on September 13, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, child, people standing, outdoors and text that says 'Claire Crosby DUET America THE Beautiful'.

node.text:
**America the Beautiful: Claire & Dave Crosby!**

The Good and the Beautiful commissioned this powerful video in celebration of its new US Constitution and Government course! This one-of-a-kind study is available now to purchase, or download the Course Book for FREE for a limited time only. Click the link in our bio to watch now!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on September 09, 2021. May be an image of 1 person, child and text.

node.text:
**Kids’ Videos You Can Trust!**

Subscribe to The Good and the Beautiful Kids Channel! Families love the clean and delightful videos that enhance learning and create peaceful homes. Plus, don’t miss our amazing new video releasing next week—featuring a major YouTube star! See the link in our bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on September 02, 2021. May be a cartoon of text that says 'Letter Sounds Videos သ'.

node.text:
**Learn the Letter Sounds!**

Visit our Kids Channel today (and be sure to subscribe too)! Our new playlist of 17 videos teaches children the letter sounds through short, fun songs with beautiful illustrations. Click the link in our bio to start watching!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on August 31, 2021. May be an image of 1 person and text that says 'Good THE AND Beautiful CHANGES FAMILIES'.

node.text:
**The Good and The Beautiful Changes Families!**

How has The Good and the Beautiful impacted your family? Visit this new YouTube playlist on our main channel (link in bio) to hear how good and beautiful curriculum and books have changed families around the world. Then share your story with us in the comments below!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on August 30, 2021.

node.text:
**New Preschool Course!**

Perfect for young learners! The new Good and the Beautiful Preschool Course is available now! With 90 bright, colorful lessons, this fun course is a complete revision of the previous edition. It includes interactive games and activities, as well as original songs and videos. Learn more at the link in our bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on August 26, 2021. May be an image of tree, outdoors and text that says 'How Many DAYS in each MONTH'.

node.text:
**New Videos for Kids!**

Make screen time a positive experience with The Good and the Beautiful Kids Channel! You’ll find educational videos, baby animals, and soothing music for your little learners! Click the link in our bio to see our newest addition to the channel: “How Many Days in Each Month.”

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on August 25, 2021. May be an image of text.

node.text:
**Homeschool Planning Help!**

Our new blog post is just in time for homeschool planning season. Both new and veteran homeschool families will appreciate the free goal-setting workbook and simple tips for planning a successful school year! Click the link in our bio.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by The Good and the Beautiful on August 24, 2021. May be an image of book and text.

node.text:
A message from Jenny Phillips: 

We have some exciting updates about our Constitution course and a new release date. 

We have made a last-minute decision to display a new painting on the cover of our US Constitution and Government course. It depicts Benjamin Franklin believing the sun was rising on our new country, not setting, on the day the Constitution was signed. It was just the beginning for our founding documents and their impact. There were major flaws in both the men and document, but the foundations of freedom for countless people were starting to dawn. 

The Good and the Beautiful believes that we should, in civil and constructive ways, discuss and listen to perspectives on sensitive and important issues, and continue to learn and grow. We have appreciated the constructive and kind feedback on this course over the past couple of weeks. We felt inspired and led as we have made wonderful changes to a few parts of the course this past week, and, thus, will release the course on September 13th. We could not be more excited for its release and our very special video, which we hope will instill feelings of gratitude for America.

We have and will continue to turn off comments on all posts and videos about the Constitution Course due to non-constructive comments. We always welcome kind and constructive emails about the course.

We remain committed to our belief that God had His hand in founding this nation and the resulting light of freedom that spread across the world. We also believe that love, unity, and progress are best achieved when we balance the negative with the positive. There are a lot of uplifting things to be found in the United States, and more than ever, we need to find that common, positive ground and unite upon it.
